message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $100 is your limit, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
